skills.skill: Scaled Agile Framework Product Owner/Product Manager

duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive program outcomes and partner with engineering teams to deliver within Agile frameworks.
Work closely with Network leaders to build alignment and visibility of strategic outcomes.
Facilitate prioritization of work cross functionally across engineering teams.
Coordinate, negotiate, and communicate with customers impacted by the program and release outcomes.
Experience in working with Jira Align and Jira to manage Epics and Stories.
Facilitate release management execution and coordination with engineering and change management teams.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in business administration, Computer Science, Information Systems or related field, or an equivalent combination of education and work experience.
Certified Scaled Agile Framework Product Owner/Product Manager
